pinyin: Shi4 jie4 Zhi1 shi2 Chan3 quan2 Zu3 zhi1
gong1 gong4 zhi1 shi5 fen4 zi3

definition: the more knowledgeable, the more reactionary (absurd anti-intellectual slogan attributed after the event to the Gang of Four 四人幫|四人帮)
pinyin: zhi1 shi5 yue4 duo1 yue4 fan3 dong4

sentences.english: In the article 50 Totally Free Lessons in Graphic Design Theory the TutsPlus family definitely delivers with a bevy of knowledge building lessons in theory
sentences.chinese: 50節圖形設計免費課程將教授你大量的理論知識。

sentences.english: There is no doubt that travelling broadens one’s mind and enlarge/improve/increase one’s knowledge.
sentences.chinese: 毫無疑問，旅行使人開闊眼界，增長知識。

sentences.english: Knowlegde can change your fate and English can accomplish your future.
sentences.chinese: 知識改變命運，英文成就未來。

sentences.english: Education and knowledge has close inner relationship.
sentences.chinese: 教育與知識有着血肉相連的內在關係。

sentences.english: IP has become an important subject in fields of diplomacy and foreign trade.
sentences.chinese: 知識產權已經成爲外交外貿領域的重要議題。

sentences.english: Teachers squeeze the knowledge into the heads of the students.
sentences.chinese: 老師將知識硬塞進學生的頭腦中。

sentences.english: Zeal without knowledge is a runaway.
sentences.chinese: 沒有知識的熱情猶如脫繮野馬。

sentences.english: You should learn some ABCs of computer.
sentences.chinese: 你瞭解編程的基礎知識嗎？

sentences.english: Knowledge without conscience is the ruination of the soul.
sentences.chinese: 沒有道德依託的知識，是對人性的毀滅。

sentences.english: Our Chinese teachers are warm-hearted. We've learned a lot here.
sentences.chinese: 我們的中國老師很熱情，在這裏，我們學到很多知識。

sentences.english: Deputy Director, Legal Affair, State Intellectual Property Office of the PRC.
sentences.chinese: 國家知識產權局條法司副司長。

sentences.english: Love and knowledge, so far as they were possible, led me upward toward the heavens.
sentences.chinese: 愛和知識可能地把我向天堂提升。

sentences.english: And I'd say this knowledge is over-fitting to past data.
sentences.chinese: 我認爲這方面的知識過適於過去的數據。

sentences.english: Finally, I give back to help others, which cements the knowledge in.
sentences.chinese: 最後，我返回來幫助其他人，進一步鞏固我的知識。

sentences.english: In the knowledge that learned during school can say basically otiose .
sentences.chinese: 在校期間學了的知識，可以說基本上沒有用的。

sentences.english: He has always been of the opinion that university students ought to have a wider range of knowledge.
sentences.chinese: 他一向主張大學生的知識面要寬一些。

definition: to teach/teaching and learning/education/CL:門|门[men2],個|个[ge4]
aspect/facet/level (political, psychological, spiritual etc)/(geology) bedding plane
practice/to put into practice/to live up to (a promise)/to carry out (a project)
to extend/to spread/to popularize/generalization/promotion (of a product etc)
theory/CL:個|个[ge4]/to argue/to take notice of
